snippet: Only a handful of votes separated Matt Bevin and James Comer in the state’s volatile Republican primary for governor.
abstract: Volatile Republican primary in Kentucky's gubernatorial election ends with only handful of votes separating contenders Matt Bevin and James Comer, who says he will ask for review of vote totals in each county.
lead_paragraph: Only a handful of votes separated Matt Bevin and James Comer in the state’s volatile Republican primary for governor.

headline.main: G.O.P. Race Virtually Tied in Kentucky
headline.print_headline: G.O.P. Race Virtually Tied in Kentucky
